describe.zh_CN: 由魔力构成的碎片，可以合成带有魔力的物品，是合成魔石的重要材料，想必研究它的人会有很多。\n它的获取方式有很多种，比如可以从其他人手里购买，这样的话...可以去村庄看看？
describe.en_US: The Pieces composed of magic can be used to craft items with magic, and are important materials for craft magic stones. I think there must be many people who study it. There are many ways to obtain it. Such as, it can be purchased from others. In that case... why not go to the village and have a look?
